relation: It gets tiring after awhile, eating the same foods over and over again.
It is very interesting sharing a bathroom with people you do not know. The only problem is you can hear everything through the ceilings.
All the students strive to succeed. The classes are very challenging.
If you stay in the dorms, it might be a long walk to campus but something you can deal with. Always be ready for any class you takeand study hard.

I think Wright State University is a very good school and is very committed to the education for every student there. They have many learning centers and you can even get a tutor for free as a freshmen. The school in general doesn't just care about the money, they care about the students.
pageTitle: Wright State University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {147767=BURT or BART, depending on who you talk to, is a GIANT, red statue which is supposed to be an interpretation of the Wright Flyer. Ask other students what the shorthand names mean. Campus also has a modern art piece covering the topic of the fall of the twin towers in 2001. I believe the statue was actually made with pieces of the fallen buildings which brings a personal touch. The best place on campus is Allyn Hall, which is the home of the Air Force ROTC program. The building has an outdoor deck where students can go to eat and is surrounded by a pool of water which is beautiful in the summer and the fall., 451252=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 223105=You should apply fairly early since most of the academic scholarships have a deadline in February. Take advantage of free tutoring for first year students. psychology 1010, super easy. Have not shown up since first week of school and have an A in the ninth week., 319516=I graduated from Wright State University in 2012. It took me five years due to health issues and family problemsa. I know that without the services that they offer free for minorities, like tutoring. I probably wouldn't have made it through. I am a first year college student . I went into college not knowing what it took to succeed but Wright State made it easy to get in touch and be mentored by people who had similar experiences as me. I would reccoment Wright State to any student who likes small classrooms, knowlegable teachers, and wants a small campus., 302600=There's a really nice mall next to campus. The area around that is quite good. Plenty of activities planned by the University Activities Board, like Fall Fest and April Craze, and WSU owns the Nutter Center where they do events and concerts (Monster trucks come, Trans-Siberian Orchestra was there, etc.), 228126=WSU has a lot of resources that make the tuition worthwhile. The campus is nice, there are plenty of student resources including on campus health clinic, a pharmacy that was just opened in 2012, counseling and legal services, and many other things., 146301=There are so many sororities on campus my head spins when I start to hear the names. These sororities also do a lot of charitable events especially during breast-cancer awareness month in October., 262646=If you plan to go to Wright State and want to live on campus, choose Hamilton Hall! It's great here. We're like ten feet away from the building where the cafeteria is (and the tunnel system! It's January and I never wear a coat because I barely have to go outside!), 149167=Wright State constantly has events going on. Students will often receive emails on seminars, magic shows, Fall Fest, May Daze, the haunted trails, Multicultural Halloween, and more! Plus, campus is surrounded by plenty of stores for shopping!}

textAfterTable: Kyle from Jamestown, OH 12/17/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 7 out of 7 people found this review useful. 2 of 107 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Its great for everyone. Wright State has something for everyone. Tips for prospective students Make sure you go to your professor for help and ask plenty of questions. If the professor knows who you are then you will do better. Also make shure you go to every class, there is know better way to know the material than actually going to class. Bang for the buck I thought Wright State was not much better than a Community College because so many people went there from my school and it was a really easy school to get into. However, Wright State leads Ohio in many different areas throughout the nation and its a great education for the little amount you actually pay. Am enjoying being here A lot of my
